name: Battle Checkers Online
description:
Battle Checkers Online is a simple and funny game for players of any age.
Tired of challenging logic games! Hooray this is for you, take a good old checkers and start the battle. To win, you need to knock off the field all the opponent's checkers. Simple and easy control will help you make accurate shots.
Play alone or with friends on the same device. Try yourself in the online contest and leave their mark on the record board!
